### WhatPromise 

#### 
Promise  Promise  JavaScript 
#### 
Promise  pendingresolvedrejected
#### 
##### 

- var promise = new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {});
- Promise.resolve()  Promise 

##### Promise.allPromise.racePromise.resolvePromise.reject

- Promise.all()

Promise.all  Promise  Promise  Promise  Promise.all(["Promise1""Promise2" "Promise2"]) all  Promise  Promise  

``` javascript
var p1 = Promise.resolve(1)
var p2 = Promise.resolve(2)
var p3 = Promise.resolve(3);
Promise.all([p1, p2, p3]).then(function(results) {
    console.log(results);  // [1, 2, 3]
});
```

- Promise.race()

Promise.race  Promise.all  Promise.race(["Promise1""Promise2""Promise3"])  Promise  Promise 

``` javascript
Promise.race([new Promise(), new Promise(), new Promise()])
```

- Promise.resolve()

 Promise resolved  Promise 

``` javascript
Promise.resolve("acrens").then(function(name) {
    console.log(name); // acrens
});
```

- Promise.reject()

 Promise rejected  reject  Promise  Promise  Promise  resolve 

``` javascript
Promise.reject(new Error("error"))
```

##### new Promise().thennew Promise().catch

- then()

 Promise  resolvedrejected then(resolve, reject) resolved  resolve  reject reject  catch  reject  Promise  resolved then  then(undefined, reject) 

``` javascript
var promise = new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
    resolve(2);
});

promise.then(function(value) {
    console.info('Task --------- ' + value); // Task  --------- 2
}).catch(function onRejected(error) {
    console.error(error);
});
```

- catch()

Post.content:
@ruanyf TDZ TDZ TDZ TDZ TDZ TDZ

      • foo x = y let ylet let x = y

      • foo x y 2 x() y y x() y 3 console.log(y) y = 1 1 1

      • foo x let y = 3 x() y funBody y y y

Post.title: line-height

Post._content:
> er line-height On block level elements, the line-height property specifies the minimum height of line boxes within the element.On non-replaced inline elements, line-height specifies the height that is used to calculate line box height.
<!-- more -->

### line-height 
line-height 

----------

#### px 
line-height: 26px  26px 

----------

#### % 
line-height: 150%  font-size: 14px  1.5 * 14px = 21px line-height  font-size  21px font-size 

----------

#### 
line-height:1.5  font:14px  line-height  font-size  line-height  font-size 

----------

#### 
 line-heightbody {font: 12px/1.5 tahoma,arial,"\5b8b\4f53"}

Post.title: XSS
Post.author: acrens
Post._content:
> XSS  XSS  XSS  100% 
<!--more-->

###  XSS 
### 
1.  RESTful  API 
2.  underscore template 

### 
<>%@

 underscore template template <%= variable %><%- variable %>
1. <%= variable %> 
2. <%- variable %>  HTML 


1. <%= variable %> & html(str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').html(_.template('<%=content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```
2.  <%= variable %> & text( str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').text(_.template('<%=content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```
3.   <%- variable %> & html(str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').html(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```
4.   <%- variable %> & text(str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').text(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));

$('.J-content').text(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```

 html  text html  HTML text  html  &amp  & <%- variable %>  &lt  &amp\;lt  html  &lt replace  &amp
``` javascript
$('.J-content').html(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}).replace(/&/g, '&'));
```

---

> XSS  XSS  XSS  100% 
<!--more-->

###  XSS 
### 
1.  RESTful  API 
2.  underscore template 

### 
<>%@

 underscore template template <%= variable %><%- variable %>
1. <%= variable %> 
2. <%- variable %>  HTML 


1. <%= variable %> & html(str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').html(_.template('<%=content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```
2.  <%= variable %> & text( str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').text(_.template('<%=content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```
3.   <%- variable %> & html(str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').html(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```
4.   <%- variable %> & text(str)
 XSS 
``` javascript
$('.J-content').text(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));

$('.J-content').text(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}));
```

 html  text html  HTML text  html  &amp  & <%- variable %>  &lt  &amp\;lt  html  &lt replace  &amp
``` javascript
$('.J-content').html(_.template('<%-content%>', {content: '<script>alert(1);</script>'}).replace(/&/g, '&'));
```
Post.content:
XSS XSS XSS 100%

  2. underscore template

Post.title: ReflowRepaint
Post.author: acrens
Post._content:
> ### ReflowRepaint #### JS HTML - [chrome](http://www.google.cn/intl/zh-CN/chrome/browser/desktop/index.html) - webkit - [safari](http://www.apple.com/cn/safari/) - webkit - [opera](http://www.opera.com/zh-cn) - webkit presto - [firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/products/) - gecko - [ie](https://support.microsoft.com/zh-tw/help/17621/internet-explorer-downloads) - trident #### 1. HTML ``` html browser rendering

Hello web performance students!

``` 2. CSS ``` css body { font-size: 16px } p { font-weight: bold } span { color: red } p span { display: none } img { float: right } ``` 3. ![](/css/images/render-tree-construction.png) 1. HTML Source DOM Tree 2. CSS Style CSSOM Tree 3. DOM Tree CSSOM Tree Render Tree 4. Reflow Render Tree 5. Repaint 1. Render Tree 2. Reflow 3. Repaint Render Tree #### Reflow Reflow Reflow Reflow Repaint Reflow Repaint Reflow Repaint JS #### reflow & repaint 1. reflow Render Tree 2. repaint reflow repaint #### reflow repaint 1. font-size ``` javascript document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].style.fontSize = '20px'; // reflow,repaint ``` 2. marginborderpaddingwidth ``` javascript let styles = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].style; styles.margin = '40px'; // reflow,repaint styles.border = '40px solid #f00'; // reflow,repaint styles.padding = '40px'; // reflow,repaint styles.width = '300px'; // reflow,repaint ``` 3. ``` javascript let styles = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].style; styles.color = '#fff'; // repaint styles.backgroundColor = '#f00'; // repaint ``` 4. offset*scroll*client*getComputedStylecurrentStyle - reflow reflow reflow reflow flush #### reflow repaint 1. JS ``` javascript let body = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]; body.className += ' class-name'; ``` 2. DOM - documentFragment - - display:none; 3. offset*scroll*client*getComputedStylecurrentStyle reflow & repaint #### - [](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/rendering/) - [Rendering: repaint, reflow/relayout, restyle](http://www.phpied.com/rendering-repaint-reflowrelayout-restyle/) - [](http://www.cnblogs.com/ihardcoder/p/3927709.html) - [](http://coolshell.cn/articles/9666.html) - [](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/chrome-devtools/rendering-tools/) - [ Timeline ](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/chrome-devtools/evaluate-performance/timeline-tool#profile-js)

ReflowRepaint

JS HTML

  • chrome - webkit
  • safari - webkit
  • opera - webkit presto
  • firefox - gecko
  • ie - trident

  1. HTML

  2. CSS

  2. CSS Style CSSOM Tree
